name: SIAM
description:
Participate in a deathmatch TV show in this immersive VR experience and fight for your life as you encounter big and strong enemies built to destroy you! Remember, it's either you or them who will make it to the end! 

Siam is a project started by curious students who wanted to explore the VR technology and experiment  it's immersion possibilities.

I would love to have your comments and impressions on this project !

PS: The Game has been optimized for Occulus DK2 so there might be some unknown problems with other devices. A gamepad is required to play the game in VR.

You can try the experience with or without a VR headset but it won't be the same !

If you liked the experience and want more of it please share this project with anyone who would enjoy it :)

Recent Updates :

-Boss 2 : The World Eater

- Scoring system and Leaderboard

-Minor Bugfix

You can follow me on Twitter @GossipGuillout
